# For ease of use make a variable that has all files for this module
set( ALL_FILES ${HEADER_FILES} ${SOURCE_FILES} ${PLATFORM_HEADER_FILES} ${PLATFORM_SOURCE_FILES} )

set( MODULE_NAME "Ogre" )
add_library( ${MODULE_NAME} ${ALL_FILES} )
add_dependencies( ${MODULE_NAME} freetype )
target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} freetype )
set_property( TARGET ${MODULE_NAME} APPEND_STRING PROPERTY COMPILE_DEFINITIONS "OGRE_NONCLIENT_BUILD;OGRE_NO_CONFIG_DIALOG" )

if ( ANDROID )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} atomic dl )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( LINUX32 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} atomic dl )
endif( LINUX32 )

if ( LINUX64 )
  target_link_libraries( ${MODULE_NAME} atomic dl )
endif( LINUX64 )

include_directories( ../../freetype/include ../../freetype/include/freetype ../../freetype/include/freetype/config ../../freetype/include/freetype/internal ../../freetype/include/freetype/internal/services ../../freetype/src/winfonts ../include include include/Hash include/Threading src src/nedmalloc src/stbi )

if ( ANDROID )
  include_directories( include/Android )
endif( ANDROID )

if ( EMSCRIPTEN )
  include_directories( include/Emscripten )
endif( EMSCRIPTEN )

if ( GLX )
  include_directories( src/GLX )
endif( GLX )

if ( GTK )
  include_directories( include/gtk src/gtk )
endif( GTK )

if ( IOS )
  include_directories( include/iOS )
endif( IOS )

if ( OSX )
  include_directories( include/OSX )
endif( OSX )

if ( WIN32 )
  include_directories( include/WIN32 src/WIN32 )
endif( WIN32 )



#******** START OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********




if (ANDROID)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (EMSCRIPTEN)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (GLX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (GTK)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (IOS)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (LINUX32)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (LINUX64)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (NACL)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (OSX)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN32)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
elseif (WIN64)
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
else()
GUCEF_config_lib( ${MODULE_NAME} )
endif()



#******** END OF AUTOGENERATED TEMPLATED ADDITION CONTENT ********
